title: Python
description: Do you want to become a UI/UX designer but you don't know where to start? This course will allow you to develop your user interface design skills and you can add UI designer to your CV and start getting clients for your skills. Hi everyone. I'm Arash and I'm a UI/UX designer. In this course, I will help you learn and master Figma app comprehensively from scratch. Figma is an innovative and brilliant tool for User Interface design. It's used by everyone from entrepreneurs and start-ups to Apple, Airbnb, Facebook, etc.
